snippet.title: NIMBY Rails Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
NIMBY Rails Early Access is releasing in Steam on 26 January 2021!

Design and run your own railroads for the real world. Fix global transportation dilemmas. Unleash your inner railway engineer and transportation policy manager.
More information in our Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1134710/NIMBY_Rails/
